named-query.name: buscarUsuarioPeloLoginESenha
named-query.query: select u from UsuarioNIU u where u.senha = :pSenha and u.login = :pLogin

named-query.name: buscarUsuarioNIUPeloLogin
named-query.query: select u from UsuarioNIU u where u.login = :pLogin

named-query.name: pesquisarChamadoPelaCategoria
named-query.query: select c from Chamado c where c.categoria = :pCategoria order by c.titulo

named-query.name: pesquisarUsuarioPelaCategoria
named-query.query: select u from UsuarioNIU u join u.categorias c where c = :pCategoria order by u.login

named-query.name: pesquisarChamadoCategoria
named-query.query: select c from ChamadoCategoria c order by c.nome

named-query.name: buscarChamadoCategoriaPeloNome
named-query.query: select cat from ChamadoCategoria cat where cat.nome = :pNome order by cat.nome

named-query.name: pesquisarChamadoCategoriaPeloFlagAtivo
named-query.query: select cat from ChamadoCategoria cat where cat.flagAtivo = :pFlagAtivo order by cat.nome

named-query.name: buscarSetorPeloNome
named-query.query: select s from Setor s where s.nome = :pNome

named-query.name: pesquisarSetor
named-query.query: select s from Setor s order by s.nome

named-query.name: pesquisarSetorPeloFlagAtivo
named-query.query: select s from Setor s where s.flagAtivo = :pFlagAtivo order by s.nome

named-query.name: buscarComputadorMarcaPeloNome
named-query.query: select m from ComputadorMarca m where m.nome = :pNome

named-query.name: pesquisarComputadorMarca
named-query.query: select m from ComputadorMarca m order by m.nome

named-query.name: pesquisarComputadorMarcaPeloFlagAtivo
named-query.query: select m from ComputadorMarca m where m.flagAtivo = :pFlagAtivo order by m.nome

named-query.name: buscarInventarioComputadorPeloNomeComputador
named-query.query: select c from InventarioComputador c where c.nomeComputador = :pNomeComputador

named-query.name: pesquisarInventarioComputador
named-query.query: select c from InventarioComputador c order by c.nomeComputador

named-query.name: buscarTutorialPeloTitulo
named-query.query: select t from BCTutorial t where t.titulo = :pTitulo

named-query.name: buscarManualPeloTitulo
named-query.query: select m from BCManual m where m.titulo = :pTitulo
